nodes.text: Ventrin bread was a type of bread found on the planet Hynestia that was made in the shape of a stick. During his escape from imprisonment in the Hynestian royal palace, Lando Calrissian used a moldy stick of ventrin bread from the refuse bin he was smuggled out in and pretended it was a blaster. He held the stick of ventrin bread on the Hynestian Princess Rinetta Gan to trick the Hynestian Royal Guard into thinking she was kidnapped, when in reality the princess was Calrissian's accomplice and engineered the escape herself.
Ventrin bread first appeared in the 2018 middle-grade novel Lando's Luck written by Justina Ireland, part of the Flight of the Falcon series.
